BiblioEntry.Title: The Sylvester graph and Moore graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The Sylvester graph and Moore graphs / A. Jurišić, J. Vidali
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Preučujemo kombinatorno strukturo Sylvestrovega grafa, znanega grafa z visoko ožino. Enostavne tehnike, kot so dvojno preštevanje, particije, lovljenje krogov in krovi, nam pomagajo identificirati manjše strukture, s katerimi pokažemo, da ni drugih grafov, s katerimi si Sylvestrov graf deli majhno število regularnostnih lastnosti. Kot posledico pokažemo enako tudi za Hoffman-Singletonov graf. Opazimo, da imajo nekateri veliko večji grafi z visoko ožino podobne lastnosti, in bi jih lahko morda preučevali s podobnimi tehnikami. Posebej pokažemo, da tako kot Hoffman-Singletonov graf vsebuje Sylvestrov graf, mora tudi Moorov graf valence 57, čigar obstoj je znan odprt problem, vsebovati podgraf s strukturo, ki je podobna tisti, ki jo izpeljemo za Sylvestrov graf.

The combinatorial structure of a famous graph with large girth, namely the Sylvester graph, is studied. Simple techniques, such as two-way counting, partitions, circuit chasing and covers are used to identify smaller structures and to show that there are no other graphs that share a small number of regularity properties with it. As a consequence, we show the same for the Hoffman-Singleton graph. We notice that some much larger graphs with large girth have similar properties, and could be studied using the same techniques. In particular, we show that just as the Hoffman-Singleton graph contains the Sylvester graph, a Moore graph of valency 57, whose existence is a famous open problem, must contain a subgraph with a structure that is similar to the one we derived for the Sylvester graph.

distance-regular graphs /generalized quadrangles /1-homogeneous property /codes /circuit chasing /Sylvester graph /Moore graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: Restrictions on classical distance-regular graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Restrictions on classical distance-regular graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Janoš Vidali
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ razdaljno regularen graf premera ▫$d \ge 2$▫. Pravimo, da ima ▫$\Gamma$▫ klasične parametre ▫$(d, b, \alpha, \beta)$▫, ko njegovo presečno zaporedje ▫$\{b_0, b_1, \dots, b_{d-1}; c_1, c_2, \dots, c_d \}$▫ zadostuje pogojema ▫$$ b_i = ([d]_b - [i]_b)(\beta - \alpha[i]_b) $$▫ in ▫$$ c_{i+1} = [i+1]_b (1 + \alpha[i]_b) $$▫ (▫$0 \le i \le d-1$▫), kjer je ▫$[i]_b := 1+b+ \dots + b^{i-1}$▫. Poleg znanih družin razdaljno regularnih grafov obstaja veliko presečnih zaporedij s klasičnimi parametri, za katere je obstoj ustreznega grafa odprt problem. Izkaže se, da v večini takih primerov velja bodisi ▫$\alpha = b-1$▫ ali ▫$\alpha = b$▫. Za slednja primera izpeljemo meje za parameter ▫$\beta$▫, kar nam da popolni klasifikaciji, ko velja ▫$b=-2$▫. Razdaljno regularni grafi s klasičnimi parametri so antipodni natanko tedaj, ko velja ▫$b=1$▫ in ▫$\beta = 1 + \alpha[d-1]_b$▫. Če pri tem izpustimo pogoj ▫$b=1$▫, se izkaže, da dobimo dvodelne ali tesne grafe. Za slednje izpeljemo eksplicitne formule za izračun parametrov particij CAB in razdaljne particije glede na neko povezavo. Na koncu najdemo še dvoparametrično družino dopustnih presečnih zaporedij za tesne razdaljno regularne grafe s klasičnimi parametri ▫$(d, b, b-1, b^{d-1})$▫ (slednji so primitivni natanko tedaj, ko velja ▫$b \ne 1$▫) in uporabimo naše rezultate, da pokažemo, da so edini taki grafi ▫$d$▫-kocke ▫$(b=1)$▫.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be a distance-regular graph with diameter ▫$d \ge 2$▫. It is said to have classical parameters ▫$(d, b, \alpha, \beta)$▫ when its intersection array ▫$\{b_0, b_1, \dots, b_{d-1}; c_1,c_2, \dots, c_d \}$▫ satisfies ▫$$b_i = ([d]_b - [i]_b)(\beta - \alpha[i]_b) \quad\text{and} \quad c_{i+1} = [i+1]_b (1 + \alpha[i]_b) \quad (0 \le i \le d-1),$$▫ where ▫$[i]_b := 1+b+ \dots + b^{i-1}$▫. Apart from the well-known families, there are many sets of classical parameters for which the existence of a corresponding graph is still open. It turns out that in most such cases we have either ▫$\alpha = b-1$ or $\alpha=b$▫. For these two cases, we derive bounds on the parameter ▫$\beta$▫, which give us complete classifications when ▫$b=-2$▫. Distance-regular graphs with classical parameters are antipodal iff ▫$b=1$▫ and ▫$\beta = 1 + \alpha[d-1]_b$▫. If we drop the condition ▫$b=1$▫, it turns out that one obtains either bipartite or tight graphs. For the latter graphs, we find closed formulas for the parameters of the CAB partitions and the distance partition corresponding to an edge. Finally, we find a two-parameter family of feasible intersection arrays for tight distance-regular graphs with classical parameters ▫$(d ,b, b-1, b^{d-1})$▫ (primitive iff ▫$b \ne 1$▫) and apply our results to show that it is realized only by ▫$d$▫-cubes ▫$(b=1)$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Classification of the family AT4(qs,q,q) of antipodal tight graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Classification of the family AT4(qs,q,q) of antipodal tight graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series A
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series A

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ antipoden razdaljno-regularen graf premera 4 z lastnimi vrednostmi ▫$\theta_0 >\theta_1 >\theta_2 >\theta_3 >\theta_4$▫. Potem je njegov Kreinov parameter ▫$q_{11}4=0$▫ natanko tedaj, ko je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ tesen v smislu Jurišića, Koolna in Terwilligerja, in nadalje natanko tedaj, ko je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ lokalno krepko regularen z netrivialnima lastnima vrednostnima ▫$p:=\theta_2$▫ in ▫$-q:=\theta_3$▫. Ko se to zgodi, lahko presečna števila grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ parametriziramo s ▫$p$▫, ▫$q$▫ in z velikostjo ▫$r$▫ antipodnega ekivalenčnega razreda grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫, zato označimo graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ z AT4▫$(p,q,r)$▫. Jurišić je postavil domnevo, da je družina ▫AT4$(p,q,r)$▫ končna in da lahko z izjemo grafov Conway-Smith, Soicher2 in ▫$3.{\rm Fi}_{24}^-$▫, grafe te družine razdelimo v štiri poddružine ▫$${\rm (i)} \; q \vert p, \;r=q,\quad {\rm (ii)} \; q \vert p, \; r=2, $$▫ ▫$${\rm (iii)} \; p=q-2, \; r=q-1, \quad {\rm (iv)} \; p=q-2, \; r=2.$$▫ V tem članku obdelamo prvo poddružino. Bolj natančno pokažemo, da imamo za parametra ▫$(s,q)$▫ grafa AT4▫$(qs,q,q)$▫ natanko pet možnosti, pri vsaki izmed teh petih možnosti pa imamo po en primer: Johnsonov graf ▫$J(8,4)$▫ za ▫$(1,2)$▫, polovično 8-kocko za ▫$(2,2)$▫, ▫$3.{\rm O}_6^-(3)$▫ graf za ▫$(1,3)$▫, Meixner2 graf za ▫$(2,4)$▫ in $3.{\rm O}_7(3)$ graf za $(3,3)$. Gonilna sila tega članka je dejstvo, da so vsi ▫$\mu$▫-grafi članov te poddružine polni večdelni.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be an antipodal distance-regular graph with diameter 4 and eigenvalues ▫$\theta_0 > \theta_1 > \theta_2 > \theta_3 > \theta_4$▫. Then its Krein parameter ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ vanishes precisely when ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight in the sense of Jurišić, Koolen and Terwilliger, and furthermore, precisely when ▫$\Gamma$▫ is locally strongly regular with nontrivial eigenvalues ▫$p := \theta_2$▫ and ▫$-q := \theta_3$▫. When this is the case, the intersection parameters of ▫$\Gamma$▫ can be parameterized by ▫$p$▫, ▫$q$▫ and the size of the antipodal classes ▫$r$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫, hence we denote ▫$\Gamma$▫ by AT4▫$(p,q,r)$▫. Jurišić conjectured that the AT4▫$(p,q,r)$▫ family is finite and that, aside from the Conway-Smith graph, the Soicher2 graph and the ▫$3.{\rm Fi}_{24}^-$▫ graph, all graphs in this family have parameters belonging to one of the following four subfamilies: ▫$${\rm (i)} \; q \vert p, \; r=q, \quad {\rm (ii)} \; q \vert p, \; r=2,$$▫ ▫$${\rm (iii)} \; p=q-2, \; r=q-1, \quad {\rm (iv)} \; p=q-2, \; r=2.$$▫ In this paper we settle the first subfamily. Specifically, we show that for a graph AT4▫$(qs,q,q)$▫ there are exactly five possibilities for the pair ▫$(s,q)$▫, with an example for each: the Johnson graph ▫$J(8,4)$▫ for ▫$(1,2)$▫, the halved 8-cube for ▫$(2,2)$▫, the ▫$3.{\rm O}_6^-(3)$▫ graph for ▫$(1,3)$▫, the Meixner2 graph for ▫$(2,4)$▫ and the ▫$3.{\rm O}_7(3)$▫ graph for ▫$(3,3)$▫. The fact that the ▫$\mu$▫-graphs of the graphs in this subfamily are completely multipartite is very crucial in this paper.

BiblioEntry.Title: On graphs with complete multipartite [mu]-graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On graphs with complete multipartite [mu]-graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Akihiro Munemasa, Yuki Tagami

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: 6th Slovenian International Conference on Graph Theory, Bled, 24-30 June 2007

BiblioSet.Title: Algebraic and topological graph theory
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Algebraic and topological graph theory / edited by S. Klavžar ... [et al.]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Jurišić in Koolen sta predlagala študijo ▫$1$▫-homogenih razdaljno-regularnih grafov, katerih ▫$\mu$▫-grafi (tj. podgrafi, ki so inducirani s skupnimi sosedi dveh vozlišč na razdalji ▫$2$▫) so polni večdelni. Na seznamu primerov so med med drugim Johnsonov graf J▫$(8,4)$▫, polovična ▫$8$▫-kocka, znani posplošeni četverokotnik ▫$(4,2)$▫, Meixnerjeva antipodna razdaljno-regularna grafa premera ▫$4$▫ in Pattersonov graf. V članku študiramo splošnejše grafe, katerih ▫$\mu$▫-grafi so polni večdelni in za katere obstaja presečno število ▫$\alpha$▫. Slednje pomeni, da za trojico ▫$(x,y,z)$▫ vozlišč grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫, kjer sta ▫$x$▫ in ▫$y$▫ sosednji, ▫$z$▫ pa je na razdalji ▫$2$▫ od obeh, število ▫$\alpha(x,y,z)$▫ skupnih sosedov od ▫$x$▫, ▫$y$▫ in ▫$z$▫, ni odvisno od izbire trojice. To lastnost imajo ▫$1$▫-homogeni grafi. Naj bo ▫$K_{t \times n}$▫ poln večdelen graf s ▫$t$▫ deli, od katerih je vsak del ▫$n$▫-koklika. Če so v grafu ▫$\Gamma$▫ vsi ▫$\mu$▫-grafi izomorfni ▫$K_{t \times n}$▫ ter obstaja presečno število ▫$\alpha$▫, potem za ▫$\alpha \ge 2$▫ dokažemo ▫$\alpha=t$▫, kot pravi domneva Jurišića in Koolna. Dokažemo tudi ▫$t \le 4$▫. Enakost velja le v primeru, ko je ▫$\Gamma$▫ natanko določen razdaljno-regularni graf ▫$3.O_7(3)$▫.

Jurišić and Koolen proposed to study ▫$1$▫-homogeneous distance-regular graphs, whose ▫$\mu$▫-graphs (that is, the graphs induced on the common neighbours of two vertices at distance ▫$2$▫) are complete multipartite. Examples include the Johnson graph J▫$(8,4)$▫, the halved ▫$8$▫-cube, the known generalized quadrangle of order ▫$(4,2)$▫, an antipodal distance-regular graph constructed by T. Meixner and the Patterson graph. We investigate a more general situation, namely, requiring the graphs to have complete multipartite ▫$\mu$▫-graphs, and that the intersection number ▫$\alpha$▫ exists, which means that for a triple ▫$(x,y,z)$▫ of vertices in ▫$\Gamma$▫, such that ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫ are adjacent and ▫$z$▫ is at distance ▫$2$▫ from ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫, the number ▫$\alpha(x,y,z)$▫ of common neighbours of ▫$x$▫, ▫$y$▫ and ▫$z$▫ does not depend on the choice of a triple. The latter condition is satisfied by any ▫$1$▫-homogeneous graph. Let ▫$K_{t \times n}$▫ denote the complete multipartite graph with ▫$t$▫ parts, each of which consists of an ▫$n$▫-coclique. We show thatif ▫$\Gamma$▫ is a graph whose ▫$\mu$▫-graphs are all isomorphic to ▫$K_{t \times n}$▫ and whose intersection number ▫$\alpha$▫ exists, then ▫$\alpha = t$▫, as conjectured by Jurišić and Koolen, provided ▫$\alpha \ge 2$▫. We also prove ▫$t \le 4$▫, and that equality holds only when ▫$\Gamma$▫ is the unique distance-regular graph ▫$3.O_7(3)$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Distance-regular graphs with light tails
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Distance-regular graphs with light tails / Aleksandar Jurišić, Paul Terwilliger, Arjana Žitnik

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: Geometric and algebraic combinatorics 4, Oisterwijk, The Netherlands, August 17 - 22, 2008

BiblioSet.Title: Geometric and Algebraic Combinatorics : papers presented at the conference GAC4 (Oisterwijk 2008)
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Geometric and Algebraic Combinatorics / Edited by Edwin R. van Dam and Willem H. Haemers
BiblioSet.Subtitle: papers presented at the conference GAC4 (Oisterwijk 2008)

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ razdaljno-regularen graf stopnje ▫$k \ge 3$▫ in premera ▫$d \ge 2$▫. Dobro je znano, da je Schurov product ▫$E \circ F$▫ poljubnih dveh minimalnih idempotentov grafa ▫$G$▫ linearna kombinacija minimalnih idempotentov grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫. Kadar ta kombinacija vsebuje manjše število sumandov je po pravilu možno izpeljati zanimive strukturne lastnosti. (glej npr. ▫$Q$▫-polinomske grafe, tesne grafe v smislu Jurišića, Koolna in Terwilligerja, in 1- ali 2-homogene grafe v smislu Nomure). V primeru, ko je ▫$E=F$▫, je minimalni idempotent ▫$E_0$▫ ranga 1 vedno prisoten v zgoraj omenjeni linearni kombinaciji in je lahko edini natanko tedaj, ko je ▫$E=E_0$▫ oziroma ▫$E=E_d$▫ in je ▫$\Gamma$▫ dvodelen. Preučujemo primer, ko je ▫$E \circ E \in {\rm span}\{E_0,H\}\,\backslash \, {\rm span}\{E_0\}$▫ za neki minimalni idempotent ▫$H$▫ grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫. Minimalni idempotent ▫$E$▫ s to lastnostjo imenujemo lahek rep. Naj bo ▫$\theta$▫ neka lastna vrednost grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫, ki ni enaka ▫$\pm k$▫ in z večkratnostjo ▫$m$▫. Pokažemo ▫$$\frac{m-k}{k} \ \ge \ -\frac{(\theta+1)^2 \, a_1\, (a_1+1)}{\bigl((a_1+1)\, \theta+k\bigr)^2+k\,a_1\,b_1}.$$▫ Naj bo ▫$E$▫ minimalni idempotent, ki ustreza ▫$\theta$▫. Enakost v zgornji neenakosti se zgodi natanko tedaj, ko je ▫$E$▫ lahek rep. Podani sta še dve karakterizaciji lahkih repov. Prva povezuje dve kosinusni zaporedji, druga pa vsebuje parametrizacijo presečnih števil grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ s parametrom ▫$a_1$▫ in kosinusnim zaporedjem, ki ustreza minimalnemu idempotentu ▫$E$▫. Na koncu študiramo še razdaljno particijo glede na dve sosednji vozlišči, in pokažemo, da so lokalni grafi razdaljno-regularnih grafov z lahkimi repi krepko regularni.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be a distance-regular graph with valency ▫$k \ge 3$▫ and diameter ▫$d \ge 2$▫. It is well known that the Schur product ▫$E \circ F$▫ of any two minimal idempotents of▫ $\Gamma$▫ is a linear combination of minimal idempotents of ▫$\Gamma$▫. Situations where there is a small number of minimal idempotents in the above linear combination can be very interesting, since they usually imply strong structural properties, see for example ▫$Q$▫-polynomial graphs, tight graphs in the sense of Jurišić, Koolen and Terwilliger, and 1- or 2-homogeneous graphs in the sense of Nomura. In the case when ▫$E=F$▫, the rank one minimal idempotent ▫$E_0$▫ is always present in this linear combination and can be the only one only if ▫$E=E_0$▫ or ▫$E=E_d$▫ and ▫$\Gamma$▫ is bipartite. We study the case when ▫$E \circ E \in {\rm span}\{E_0,H\}\,\backslash \, {\rm span}\{E_0\}$▫ for some minimal idempotent ▫$H$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫. We call a minimal idempotent ▫$E$▫ with this property a light tail. Let ▫$\theta$▫ be an eigenvalue of ▫$\Gamma$▫ not equal to ▫$\pm k$▫ and withmultiplicity ▫$m$▫. We show that ▫$$\frac{m-k}{k} \ \ge \ -\frac{(\theta+1)^2\, a_1\, (a_1+1)}{\bigl((a_1+1)\, \theta + k\bigr)^2+k\,a_1\,b_1}.$$▫ Let ▫$E$▫ be the minimal idempotent corresponding to ▫$\theta$▫. The equality case is equivalent to ▫$E$▫ being a light tail. Two additional characterizations of the case when ▫$E$▫ is a light tail are given. One involves a connection between two cosine sequences and the other one a parameterization of the intersection numbers of ▫$\Gamma$▫ with ▫$a_1$▫ and the cosine sequence corresponding to ▫$E$▫. We also study distance partitions of vertices with respect to two vertices and show that the distance-regular graphs with light tails are very close to being 1-homogeneous. In particular, their local graphs are strongly regular.

graph theory /Krein parameters /distance-regular graphs /locally strongly regular /minimal idempotents

BiblioEntry.Title: The Q-polynomial idempotents of a distance-regular graph
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The Q-polynomial idempotents of a distance-regular graph / Aleksandar Jurišić, Paul Terwilliger, Arjana Žitnik

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B

BiblioEntry.Abstract: We obtain the following characterization of ▫$Q$▫-polynomial distance-regular graphs. Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ denote a distance-regular graph with diameter ▫$d \geqslant 3$▫. Let ▫$E$▫ denote a minimal idempotent of ▫$\Gamma$▫ which is not the trivial idempotent ▫$E_0$▫. Let ▫$\{\theta_i^\ast\}_{i=0}^d$▫ denote the dual eigenvalue sequence for ▫$E$▫. We show that ▫$E$▫ is ▫$Q$▫-polynomial if and only if (i) the entry-wise product ▫$E \circ E$▫ is a linear combination of ▫$E_0$▫, ▫$E$▫, and at most one other minimal idempotent of ▫$\Gamma$▫; (ii) there exists a complex scalar ▫$\beta$▫ such that ▫$\theta_{i-1}^\ast - \beta \theta_i^\ast + \theta_{i+1}^\ast$▫ is independent of ▫$i$▫ for ▫$1 \leqslant i \leqslant d-1$▫; (iii) ▫$\theta_i^\ast \neq \theta_0^\ast$▫ for ▫$1 \leqslant i \leqslant d$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Triangle-free distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity equal to their valency and diameter 3
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Triangle-free distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity equal to their valency and diameter 3 / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen, Arjana Žitnik
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo razdaljno-regularne grafe premera 3, ki so brez trikotnikov in imajo lastno vrednost ▫$\theta$▫, katere večkratnost je enaka valenci grafa. Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ tak graf. Najprej pokažemo da je ▫$\theta = -1$▫ natanko tedaj, ko je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ antipoden. Nato privzamemo, da je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ primitiven. Dokažemo, da je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ formalno sebi-dualen (ter zato tudi ▫$Q$▫-polinomski in 1-homogen),vse njegove lastne vrednosti so celoštevilske, lastna vrednost, katere večkratnost je enaka valenci, pa je bodisi druga največja ali pa najmanjša. Naj bosta ▫$x,y \in V\Gamma$▫ sosednjiin ▫$z\in \Gamma_2(x)\cap Gamma_2(y)$▫. Potem je presečno število ▫$\tau_2:=|\Gamma(z)\cap \Gamma_3(x)\cap \Gamma_3(y)|$▫ neodvisno od izbire vozlišč ▫$x$▫, ▫$y$▫ in ▫$z$▫. V primeru grafa odsekov dvakrat skrajšane binarne Golayeve kode velja ▫$b_2=\tau_2$▫. Klasificiramo vse grafe z ▫$b_2=\tau_2$▫ in ugotovimo, da je pravkar omenjeni graf edini tak primer. S tem pokažemo, da ne obstaja graf katerega presečno zaporedje bi bilo element neke neskončne družine (dotlej) dopustnih presečnih zaporedij.

In this paper, triangle-free distance-regular graphs with diameter 3 and an eigenvalue ▫$\theta$▫ with multiplicity equal to their valency are studied. Let ▫$Gamma$▫ be such a graph. We first show that ▫$\theta = -1$▫ if and only if ▫$\Gamma$▫ is antipodal. Then we assume that the graph ▫$\Gamma$▫ is primitive. We show that it is formally self-dual (and hence ▫$Q$▫-polynomial and 1-homogeneous), all its eigenvalues are integral, and the eigenvalue with multiplicity equal to the valency is either second largest or the smallest. Let ▫$x,y \in VG▫$ be two adjacent vertices, and ▫$zG_2(x) \cap G_2(y)$▫. Then the intersection number ▫$\tau_2 := |\Gamma(z) \cap \Gamma_3(x) \cap G_3(y)|$▫ is independent of the choice of vertices ▫$x$▫, ▫$y$▫ and ▫$z$▫. In the case of the coset graph of the doubly truncated binary Golay code, we have ▫$b_2 = \tau_2$▫. We classify all the graphs with ▫$b_2 = \tau_2$▫ and establish that the just mentioned graph is the only example. In particular, we rule out an infinite family of otherwise feasible intersection arrays.

BiblioEntry.Title: Pseudo 1-homogeneous distance-regular graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Pseudo 1-homogeneous distance-regular graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Paul Terwilliger
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be a distance-regular graph of diameter ▫$d \ge 2$▫ and ▫$a_1 \ne 0$▫. Let ▫$\theta$▫ be a real number. A pseudo cosine sequence for ▫$\theta$▫ is a sequence of real numbers ▫$\sigma_0,...,sigma_d$▫ such that ▫$\sigma_0=1$▫ and ▫$c_i \sigma_{i-1}+a_i \sigma_i + b_i\sigma_{i+1} = \theta \sigma_i$▫ for all ▫$i \in \{0,...,d-1\}$▫. Furthermore, a pseudo primitive idempotent for ▫$\theta$▫ is ▫$E_\theta = s\sum_{i=0}^d \sigma_iA_i$▫, where ▫$s$▫ is any nonzero scalar. Let ▫$\widehat{v}$▫ be the characteristic vector of a vertex ▫$v in V\Gamma$▫. For an edge ▫$xy$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫ and the characteristic vector ▫$w$▫ of the set of common neighbours of ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫, we say that the edge ▫$xy$▫ is tight with respect to ▫$\theta$▫ whenever ▫$\theta \ne k$▫ and a nontrivial linear combination of vectors ▫$E\widehat{x}$▫, ▫$E\widehat{y}$▫ and ▫$E\widehat{w}$▫ is contained in Span▫$\{\widehat{z}| z \in V\Gamma, \; \partial(z,x) = \partial(x,y)\}$▫. When an edge of ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight with respect to two distinct real numbers, a parameterization with ▫$d+1$▫ parameters of the members of the intersection array of ▫$\Gamma$▫ is given (using the pseudo cosines ▫$\sigma_1,...,\sigma_d$▫, and an auxiliary parameter ▫$\varepsilon$▫). Let ▫$S$▫ be the set of all the vertices of ▫$\Gamma$▫ that are not at distance ▫$d$▫ from both vertices ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫ that are adjacent. The graph ▫$\Gamma$▫ is pseudo 1-homogeneous with respect to ▫$xy$▫ whenever the distance partition of ▫$S$▫ corresponding to the distances from ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫ is equitable in the subgraph induced on ▫$S$▫. We show ▫$\Gamma$▫ is pseudo 1-homogeneous with respect to the edge ▫$xy$▫ if and only if the edge ▫$xy$▫ is tight with respect to two distinct real numbers. Finally, let us fix a vertex ▫$x$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫. Then the graph ▫$\Gamma$▫ is pseudo 1-homogeneous with respect to any edge ▫$xy$▫, and the local graph of ▫$x$▫ is connected if and only if there is the above parameterization with ▫$d+1$▫ parameters ▫$\sigma_1, ... ,\sigma_d, \varepsilon$▫ and the local graph of ▫$x$▫ is strongly regular with nontrivial eigenvalues ▫$a_1\sigma/(1+\sigma)$▫ and ▫$(\sigma_2 - 1)/(\sigma - \sigma_2)$▫.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Using equality in the Krein conditions to prove nonexistence of certain distance-regular graphs / Kris Coolsaet, Aleksandar Jurišić

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Dokažemo, da razdaljno-regularni grafi s presečnim zaporedjem ▫$\{74,54,15;1,9,60\}$▫ in ▫$${4r^3+8r^2+6r+1, 2r(r+1)(2r+1), 2r^2+2r+1; 1, 2r(r+1), (2r+1)(2r^2+2r+1)}$$▫, kjer je ▫$r$▫ poljubno naravno število, ne obstajajo. Oba primera služita kot ilustracija za tehniko, ki nam pomaga določiti strukturne lastnosti razdaljno-regularnih grafov in asociativnih shem z dovolj velikim številom ničelnih Kreinovih parametrov.

We prove the nonexistence of a distance-regular graph with intersection array ▫$\{74,54,15;1,9,60\}$▫ and of distance-regular graphs with intersection arrays ▫$${4r^3+8r^2+6r+1, 2r(r+1)(2r+1), 2r^2+2r+1; 1, 2r(r+1), (2r+1)(2r^2+2r+1)}$$▫ with ▫$r$▫ an integer and ▫$r \geqslant 1$▫. Both cases serve to illustrate a technique which can help in determining structural properties for distance-regular graphs and association schemes with a sufficient number of vanishing Krein parameters.

BiblioEntry.Title: On triangle-free distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity equal to the valency
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On triangle-free distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity equal to the valency / Kris Coolsaet, Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen
BiblioEntry.Abstract:
Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be a triangle-free distance-regular graph with diameter ▫$d \ge 3$▫, valency ▫$k 
e 3$▫ and intersection number ▫$a_2 
e 0$▫. Assume ▫$\Gamma$▫ has an eigenvalue with multiplicity ▫$k$▫. We show that ▫$\Gamma$▫ is 1-homogeneous in the sense of Nomura when ▫$d=3$▫ or when ▫$d \ge 4$▫ and ▫$a_4=0$▫. In the latter case we prove that ▫$\Gamma$▫ is an antipodal cover of a strongly regular graph, which means that it has diameter 4 or 5. For ▫$d=5$▫ the following infinite family of feasible intersection arrays: ▫$$\{2\mu^2+\mu, 2\mu^2+\mu-1, \mu^2, \mu, 1; 1, \mu, \mu^2, 2\mu^2+\mu-1, 2\mu^2+\mu\}, \quad \mu \in {\mathbb{N}},$$▫ is known. For ▫$\mu=1$▫ the intersection array is uniquely realized by the dodecahedron. For ▫$\mu 
e 1$▫ we show that there are no distance-regular graphs with this intersection array.

BiblioEntry.Title: Distance-regular graphs with complete multipartite [mu]-graphs and AT4 family
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Distance-regular graphs with complete multipartite [mu]-graphs and AT4 family / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ antipoden razdaljno-regularen graf premera 4 z lastnimi vrednostmi ▫$\theta_1 > \theta_2 > \theta_3 > \theta_4$▫. Potem je njegov Kreinov parameter ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ enak 0 natanko tedaj, ko je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ tesen v smislu Jurišića, Koolna in Terwilligerja, in nadalje natanko tedaj, ko je ▫$\Gamma$▫ lokalno krepko regularen z netrivialnimi lastnimi vrednostmi ▫$p:=\theta_2$▫ in ▫$-q:=\theta_3$▫. V tem primeru lahko parametriziramo presečno zaporedje grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ s ▫$p$▫, ▫$q$▫ in velikostjo ▫$r$▫ antipodnega razreda grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫. Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ antipodni tesni graf premera 4, oznaka AT4▫$(p,q,r)$▫, in naj bo ▫$\mu$▫-graf tisti graf, ki ga inducirajo skupni sosedi dveh vozlišč na razdalji 2. Potem pokažemo, da so vsi ▫$\mu$▫-grafi v ▫$\Gamma$▫ polni večdelni, če in samo če je ▫$\Gamma$▫ enak AT4▫$(sq,q,q)$▫ za neko naravno število ▫$s$▫. Kot posledico izpeljemo nove neeksistenčne pogoje za grafe iz družine AT4, katerih ▫$\mu$▫-grafi niso polni večdelni. Druga zanimiva uporaba naših rezultatov pa je dokaz, da so ▫$\mu$▫-grafi razdaljno-regularnega grafa z enakim presečnim zaporedjem, kot ga ima Pattersonov graf, polni dvodelni grafi ▫$K_{4,4}$▫.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be an antipodal distance-regular graph of diameter 4, with eigenvalues ▫$\theta_0 > \theta_1 > \theta_2 > \theta_3 > \theta_4$▫. Then its Krein ▫$q_{11}^4$▫parameter vanishes precisely when ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight in the sense of Jurišić, Koolen and Terwilliger, and furthermore, precisely when ▫$\Gamma$▫ is locally strongly regular with nontrivial eigenvalues ▫$p:=\theta_2$▫ and ▫$-q:=\theta_3$▫. When this is the case, the intersection parameters of ▫$\Gamma$▫ can be parametrized by ▫$p, q$▫ and the size of the antipodal classes ▫$r$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫. Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be an antipodal tight graph of diameter 4, denoted by AT4▫$(p, q, r)$▫, and let the ▫$\mu$▫-graph be a graph that is induced by the common neighbours of two vertices at distance 2. Then we show that all the ▫$\mu$▫-graphs of ▫$\Gamma$▫ are complete multipartite if and only if ▫$G$▫ is AT4▫$(sq,q,q)$▫ for some natural number ▫$s$▫. As a consequence, we derive new existence conditions for graphs of the AT4 family whose ▫$\mu$▫-graphs are not complete multipartite. Another interesting application of our results is also that we were able to show that the ▫$\mu$▫-graphs of a distance-regular graph with the same intersection array as the Patterson graph are the complete bipartite graph ▫$K_{4,4}$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Triangle- and pentagon-free distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity equal to the valency
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Triangle- and pentagon-free distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity equal to the valency / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen, Štefko Miklavič

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Klasificiramo razdaljno-regularne grafe brez trikotnikov in brez petkotnikov,premera ▫$d \le 2$▫ in stopnje ▫$k$▫, ki imajo lastno vrednost večkratnosti ▫$k$▫. Bolj natančno, dokažemo, da so taki grafi bodisi izomorfni ciklom, ▫$k$▫-razsežnim kockam, polnim dvodelnim grafom brez prirejanja, Hadamardjevim grafom, razdaljno-regularnim grafom s presečnim zaporedjem ▫$\{k, k-1, k-c, c, 1; 1, c, k-c, k-1, k\}$▫, kjer je ▫$k=\gamma(\gamma^2 +3\gamma +1)$▫, ▫$c =\gamma(\gamma +1)$▫, ▫$\gamma \in \NN$▫, bodisi prepognjenim ▫$k$▫-razsežnim kockam, kjer je ▫$k$▫ liho število in ▫$k \ge 7$▫. To predstavlja posplošitev rezultatov Nomure (J. Combin. Theory Ser.B 64 (1995), 300-313) in Yamazakija (J. Combin. Theory Ser. B 66 (1996), 34-37), ki sta klasificirala dvodelne razdaljno-regularne grafe z lastno vrednostjo večkratnosti ▫$k$▫ in pokazala, da so vsi taki grafi 2-homogeni. Nadalje klasificiramo skoraj 2-homogene razdaljno-regularne grafe diametra ▫$d \ge 4$▫. Bolj konkretno, pokažemo, da so taki grafi bodisi 2-homogeni (in torej klasificirani od Nomure in Yamazakija) ali pa izomorfni prepognjeni ▫$k$▫-razsežni kocki, kjer je ▫$k$▫ sodo število, ali posplošenemu ▫$2d$▫-kotniku reda ▫$(1,k-1)$▫.

We classify triangle- and pentagon-free distance-regular graphs with diameter ▫$d \ge 2$▫, valency ▫$k$▫, and an eigenvalue multiplicity ▫$k$▫. In particular, we prove that such a graph is isomorphic to a cycle, a ▫$k$▫-cube, a complete bipartite graph minus a matching, a Hadamard graph, a distance-regular graph with intersection array ▫$\{k, k-1, k-c, c, 1; 1, c, k-c, k-1, k\}$▫, where ▫$k = \gamma(\gamma^2 + 3\gamma + 1)$▫, ▫$c = \gamma(\gamma + 1)$▫, ▫$\gamma \in \NN$▫, or a folded ▫$k$▫-cube, ▫$k$▫ odd and ▫$k \ge 7$▫. This is a generalization of the results of Nomura (J. Combin. Theory Ser. B 64 (1995) 300-313) and Yamazaki (J. Combin. Theory Ser. B 66 (1996) 34-37), where they classified bipartite distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue multiplicity ▫$k$▫ and showed that all such graphs are 2-homogeneous. We also classify bipartite almost 2-homogeneous distance-regular graphs with diameter ▫$d \ge 4$▫. In particular, we prove that such a graph is either 2-homogeneous (and thus classified by Nomura and Yamazaki), or a folded ▫$k$▫-cube for ▫$k$▫ even, or a generalized ▫$2d$▫-gon with order ▫$(1,k-1)$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: AT4 family and 2-homogeneous graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: AT4 family and 2-homogeneous graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫${\cal C}$▫ družina antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov z diametrom štiri in ▫$\Gamma \in {\cal C}$▫ graf z lastnimi vrednostmi ▫$k = \theta_0 > \theta_1 >...> \theta_4$▫ in velikostjo antipodnih razredov ▫$r$▫. Potem za njegove Kreinove parametre velja: ▫$$q_{11}^2 q_{12}^3 q_{13}^4 q_{22}^2 q_{22}^4 q_{23}^3 q_{24}^4 q_{33}^4 \ne 0, \qquad q_{12}^2 = q_{12}^4 = q_{14}^4 = q_{22}^3 = q_{23}^4 = q_{34}^4 = 0$$▫ and ▫$$q_{11}^1, q_{11}^3, q_{13}^3, q_{33}^3 \in (r-2)\RR.$$▫ Preostaneta nam samo še dve Kreinovi oceni, to sta ▫$q_{11}^4 \ge 0$▫ in ▫$q_{44}^4 \ge 0$▫. Jurišić in Koolen sta pokazala, da iz ▫$q_{11}^4=0$▫ za ▫$\Gamma$▫ sledi, da je ▫$\Gamma$▫ 1-homogen v smislu Nomure, kar pomeni, da je tudi lokalno krepko regularen. Posvetimo se primeru, ko je ▫$q_{44}^4$▫ grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ enak 0. Dobro znani rezultat Camerona, Goethalsa in Seidela zagotovi, da je ▫$\Gamma$▫ krepko regularen. Zberemo nekaj pokazateljev, da iz ▫$q_{44}^4 = 0$▫ sledi, da je ▫$\Gamma$▫ bodisi brez trikotnikov (v tem primeru je 1-homogen) ali pa velja tudi ▫$q_{11}^4 = 0$▫. Nato dokažemo, da iz ▫$q_{11}^4 = 0$▫ in ▫$q_{44}^4 = 0$▫ za graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ sledi, da je vsak graf, ki je induciran z vsemi vozlišči, ki so na razdalji od nekega vozlišča, zopet antipoden razdaljno regularen graf z diametrom štiri. Če pa je ▫$\Gamma$▫ še dvojni krov, tj. ▫$Q$▫-polinom, potem je 2-homogen v smislu Nomure.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ denote an antipodal distance-regular graph of diameter four with eigenvalues ▫$k = \theta_0 > \theta_1 > ... > \theta_4$▫ and antipodal class size ▫$r$▫. Then its Krein parameters satisfy: ▫$$q_{11}^2 q_{12}^3 q_{13}^4 q_{22}^2 q_{22}^4 q_{23}^3 q_{24}^4 q_{33}^4 \ne 0, \quadd q_{12}^2 = q_{12}^4 = q_{14}^4 = q_{22}^3 = q_{23}^4 = q_{34}^4 = 0$$▫ and ▫$$q_{11}^1, q_{11}^3, q_{13}^3, q_{33}^3 \in (r-2)\RR^{+}.$$▫ It remains to consider only two more Krein bounds, namely ▫$q_{11}^4 \ge 0$▫ and ▫$q_{44}^4 \ge 0$▫. Jurišić and Koolen showed that vanishing of the Krein parameter ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫ implies that ▫$\Gamma$▫ is 1-homogeneous in the sense of Nomura, so it is also locally strongly regular. We study vanishing of the Krein parameter ▫$q_{44}^4$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫. In this case a well known result of Cameron, Goethals and Seidel implies that ▫$\Gamma$▫ is locally strongly regular. We gather some evidence that vanishing of the Krein parameter ▫$q_{44}^4$▫ implies ▫$\Gamma$▫ is either triangle-free (in which case it is 1-homogeneous) or the Krein parameter ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ vanishes as well. Then we prove that vanishing of both Krein parameters ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ and ▫$q_{44}^4$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫ implies that every second subconstituent graph is again an antipodal distance-regular graph of diameter four. Finally, if ▫$\Gamma$▫ is also a double-cover, i.e. ▫$r=2$▫, i.e., ▫$Q$▫-polynomial, then it is 2-homogeneous in the sense of Nomura.

BiblioEntry.Title: 1-homogeneous graphs with Coctail Party [mu]-graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: 1-homogeneous graphs with Coctail Party [mu]-graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Na bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ 1-homogen graf v smislu Nomure z diametrom ▫$d \ge 2$▫, tj. za vsako povezavo ▫$xy$▫ grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ je razdaljna particija ▫$$\{\{z \in V(\Gamma)| \partial(x,y)=i, \partial(x,z)=j\} | 0 \le i,j \le d\}$$▫ ekvitabilna in njeni parametri niso odvisni od izbire povezave ▫$xy$▫. Potem je ▫$\Gamma$▫ razdaljno regularen graf in tudi lokalno krepko regularen. Lokalni grafi imajo enake parametre. Označimo jih z ▫$(v',k', \lambda',\mu')$▫. Očitno velja ▫$v'=k$▫, ▫$k'=a_1$▫, ▫$(v'-k'-1)\mu' = k'(k'-1-\lambda')$▫ in ▫$c_2 \ge \mu'+1$▫, saj je vsak ▫$\mu$▫-graf regularen graf z valenco ▫$\mu'$▫. Poznamo številne zanimive primere 1-homogenih grafov, katerih ▫$\mu$▫-grafi so izomorfni nekaj kopijam polnih večpartitnih grafov. Na primer, če velja enakost v zgornji oceni in je ▫$c_2 \ne 1$▫, potem je ▫$\Gamma$▫ Terwilligerjev graf (tj. vsi njegovi ▫$\mu$▫-grafi so polni) in te grafe smo že klasificirali. V članku študiramo primer ▫$c_2 = \mu'+2 \ge 3$▫, to je primer, ko so ▫$\mu$▫-grafi grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ Coktail party grafi in izpeljemo, da velja bodisi ▫$\lambda'=0$▫, ▫$\mu'=2$▫ ali pa je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ eden od naslednjih grafov: (i) Johnsonov graf ▫$J(2m,m)$▫ ▫$m \ge 2$▫, (ii) Prepognjen Johnsonov graf ▫$\overline{J}(4m,2m}$▫ ▫$m \ge 3$▫, (iii) polovična ▫$m$▫-kocka, ▫$m \ge 4$▫, (iv) prepognjena polovična ▫$(2m)$▫-kocka ▫$m \ge 5$▫, (v) Cocktail Party graf ▫$K_{m \times 2}$▫, ▫$m \ge 3$▫, (vi) Schläflijev graf , (vii) Gossetov graf.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be a 1-homogeneous graph in the sense of Nomura with diameter ▫$d \ge 2$▫, i.e., for every edge ▫$xy$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫ the distance partition ▫$$\{\{z \in V(\Gamma)| \partial(x,y)=i, \partial(x,z)=j\} | 0 \le i,j \le d$$▫ is equitable and its parameters do not depend on the edge ▫$xy$▫. Then ▫$\Gamma$▫ is distance-regular and also locally strongly regular. The local graphs have the same parameters. Let us denote them by ▫$(v',k', \lambda', \mu')$▫. Obviously we have ▫$v'=k$▫, ▫$k'=a_1$▫, ▫$(v'-k'-1)\mu' = k'(k'-1-\lambda')$▫ and ▫$c_2 \ge \mu'+1$▫, since a ▫$\mu$▫-graph is a regular graph with valency ▫$\mu'$▫. Thera several interesting examples of 1-homogeneous graphs whose ▫$\mu$▫-graphs are isomorphic to a few copies of complete multipartite graphs. For example, if equality holds in the above bound and ▫$c_2 \ne 1$▫, then ▫$\Gamma$▫ is a Terwilliger graph, i.e., all the ▫$\mu$▫-graphs are complete, and we have already classified such graphs. In this article we consider the case ▫$c_2 = \mu'+2 \ge 3$▫, i.e. the case when the ▫$\mu$▫-graphs of ▫$\Gamma$▫ are the Cocktail Party graphs, and obtain that either ▫$\lambda'=0$▫, ▫$\mu'=2$▫ or ▫$\Gamma$▫ is one of the following graphs: (i) a Johnson graph ▫$J(2m,m)$▫ with ▫$m \ge 2$▫, (ii) a folded Johnson graph ▫$\overline{J}(4m,2m}$▫ with ▫$m \ge 3$▫, (iii) a halved ▫$m$▫-cube with ▫$m \ge 4$▫, (iv) a folded halved ▫$(2m)$▫-cube with ▫$m \ge 5$▫, (v) a Cocktail Party graph ▫$K_{m \times 2}$▫ with ▫$m \ge 3$▫, (vi) the Schläfli graph, (vii) the Gosset graph.

BiblioEntry.Title: Krein parameters and antipodal tight graphs with diameter 3 and 4
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Krein parameters and antipodal tight graphs with diameter 3 and 4 / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Določimo, kateri Kreinovi parametri antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov z diametrom tri in štiri so lahko nič ter podamo kombinatorične karakterizacije primerov, ko so enaki nič. Študiramo tudi tesne razdaljno regularne grafe z diametrom tri in štiri. V primeru diametra tri so tesni grafi natanko Taylorjevi grafi. V primeru antipodnih razdaljno regularnih gradov z diametrom štiri pa so tesni grafi natanko grafi, za katere je Kreinov parameter ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ enak nič.

We determine which Krein parameters of nonbipartite antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter three and four can be vanish, and give combinatorial interpretations of their vanishing. We also study tight distance-regular graphs of diameter three and four. In the case of diameter three, tight graphs are precisely the Taylor graphs. In the case of antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter four, tight graphs are precisely the graphs for which the Krein parameter ▫$q_{11}^4$▫ vanishes.

mathematics /algebraic combinatorics /graph theory /Krein parameters /distance-regular graphs /tight graphs /antipodal graphs /Taylor graphs /1-homogeneous /locally strongly-regular

BiblioEntry.Title: Problem Mercedesovega vozla
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Problem Mercedesovega vozla / Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek obravnava naslednji topološki problem: sredi (okrogle) sobe si zamislimo žogo, ki je s tremi elastičnimi trakovi ▫$b$▫, ▫$m$▫ in ▫$w$▫ povezana s stenami. Ali je mogoče s premikanjem trakov (ne pa tudi njihovih koncev) naviti trak ▫$m$▫ okoli traku ▫$w$▫, ne da bi pri tem premaknili žogo? Ta problem zaradi oblike, ki jo tvorijo žoga in trije trakovi, imenujemo "problem Mercedesovega vozla". Predstavljen je enostaven način, kako trak navijemo dvakrat (in zato tudi poljubno sodokrat). Nazorna (negativna)rešitev začetnega problema je podana s pomočjo pojma sučnega števila.

The paper is devoted to the following topological problem. Imagine a solid ball in the midle of a (round) room connected with three elastic bands ▫$b$▫, ▫$m$▫ and ▫$w$▫ to the walls. Is it possible to move tha elastic bands (but not their ends) in such a way that the band ▫$m$▫ becomes wrapped precisely once around the band ▫$w$▫ without moving the ball? The problem is called "the Mercedes knot problem" because of the shape formed by the ball and the three bands. A simple way to wrap the bands twice (and, and therefore, any even number of times) is shown. A transparent (negative) solution of the initial problem based on the notion of twisting number is presented.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /topologija /kombinatorika /vozli
mathematics /topology /combinatorics /knots

BiblioEntry.Title: A local approach to 1-homogeneous graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: A local approach to 1-homogeneous graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$\Gamma$▫ razdaljno regularen graf z diametrom ▫$d$▫. Za vozlišči ▫$x$▫ in ▫$y$▫ grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ na razdalji ▫$i$▫, ▫$1 \le i \le d$▫, definiramo množice ▫$C_i = \Gamma_{i-1}(x) \cap \Gamma(y)$▫, ▫$A_i(x,y) = \Gamma_i(x) \cap \Gamma(y)$▫ in ▫$B_i(x,y) = \Gamma_{i+1}(x) \cap \Gamma(y)$▫. Potem rečemo, da ima graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ lastnost CAB▫$_j$▫, če je particija ▫$CAB_i(x,y) = \{C_i(x,y), A_i(x,y), B_i(x,y)\}$▫ lokalnega grafa vozlišča ▫$y$▫ ekvitabilna za vsak par ▫$x$▫ in ▫$y$▫ grafa ▫$\Gamma$▫ na razdalji ▫$i \le j$▫. Graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ ima lastnost CAB, če ima lastnost CAB▫$_d$▫. Pokažemo ekvivalentnost lastnosti CAB in lastnosti 1-homogenosti v razdaljno regularnem grafu z ▫$a_1 \ne 0$▫ in klasificiramo 1-homogene Terwilligerjeve grafe s ▫$c_2 \ge 2$▫.

Let ▫$\Gamma$▫ be a distance-regular graph with diameter ▫$d$▫. For vertices ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫ at distance ▫$i$▫, ▫$1 \le i \le d$▫, we define the sets ▫$C_i = \Gamma_{i-1}(x) \cap \Gamma(y)$▫, ▫$A_i(x,y) = \Gamma_i(x) \cap \Gamma(y)$▫ and ▫$B_i(x,y) = \Gamma_{i+1}(x) \cap \Gamma(y)$▫. Then we say ▫$\Gamma$▫ has CAB▫$_j$▫ property, if the partition ▫$CAB_i(x,y) = \{C_i(x,y), A_i(x,y), B_i(x,y)\}$▫ of the local graph of ▫$y$▫ is equitable for each pair of vertices ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫ of ▫$\Gamma$▫ at distance ▫$i \le j$▫. We show that if ▫$\Gamam$▫ has a CAB▫$_j$▫ property then the parameteres of the equitable partitions ▫$CAB_i(x,y)$▫ do not depend on the choice of vertices ▫$x$▫ and ▫$y$▫ at distance ▫$i$▫ for all ▫$i \le j$▫. The graph ▫$\Gamma$▫ has the CAB property if it has the CAB▫$_d$▫ property. We show the equivalence of CAB property and 1-homogeneous property in a distance-regular graph with ▫$a_1 \ne 0$▫. Finally, we classify the 1-homogeneous Terwilliger graphs with ▫$c_2 \ge 2$▫.

mathematics /algebraic combinatorics /distance-regular graphs /equitable partitions /1-homogeneous /locally strongly-regular graphs /regular near polygons /Terwilliger graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: Nonexistence of some antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter four
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Nonexistence of some antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter four / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Izpeljemo neenakost, ki vsebuje lastne vrednosti regularnega grafa; enakost velja, če in samo če je graf krepko regularen. To neenakost uporabimo na lokalnem grafu (tj. grafu, ki ga inducirajo sosedi nekega vozlišča) razdaljno regularnega grafa in na ta način pridemo do zelo enostavnega in kratkega dokaza osnovne neenakosti za razdaljno regularne grafe, ki so jo našli Jurišić, Koolen and Terwilliger. Z uporabo te neenakosti pokažemo, da so lokalni grafi razdaljno regularnih grafov z določenimi presečnimi števili krepko regularni. Iz teh rezultatov izpeljemo neeksistenco razdaljno regularnih grafov, ki pripadajo dvajsetim, sicer možnim, presečnim zaporedjem iz referenčne knjige Distance Regular Graphs, ki so jo napisali Brouwer, Cohen in Neumaier.

We find an inequality involving the eigenvalue of a regular graph; equality holds if and only if the graph is strongly regular. We apply this inequality to the first subconstituents of a distance-regular graph and obtain a simple proof of the fundamental bound for distance-regular graphs, discovered by Jurišić, Koolen and Terwilliger. Using this we show that for distance-regular graphs with certain intersection arrays, the first subconstituent graphs are strongly regular. From these results we prove the nonexistence of distance-regular graphs associated to 20 feasible intersection arrays from the book Distance-regular graphs by Brouwer, Cohen and Neumaier.

mathematics /algebraic combinatorics /graph theory /distance-regular graphs /inequalities /tight graphs /1-homogeneous /locally strongly-regularity /nonexistence /antipodality

BiblioEntry.Title: Tight distance-regular graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Tight distance-regular graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jack Koolen, Paul Terwilliger
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Obravnavamo razdaljno regularni graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ z diametrom ▫$d \ge 3$▫ in z lastnimi vrednostmi ▫$k = \theta_0 > \theta_1 >...> \theta_d$▫. Pokažemo, da presečna števila ▫$a_1,b_1$▫ zadovoljujejo neenakost ▫$$(\theta_1 + \frac{k}{a_1+1}) (\theta_d +\frac{k}{a_1+1} \ge -\frac{ka_1b_1}{(a_1+1)^2}.$$▫ Pravimo, da je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ tesen, kadar ni bipartiten in zgoraj velja enakost. Tesne grafe karakteriziramo na več načinov. Pokažemo, na primer, da je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ tesen, če in samo če se dajo presečna števila izraziti z določenimi racionalnimi izrazi, ki vsebujejo ▫$d$▫ neodvisnih parametrov. Nato pokažemo, da je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ tesen, če in samo če je ▫$a_1 \ne 0$▫, ▫$a_d=0$▫ in je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ 1-homogen v smislu Nomure. Nazadnje pokažemo da je graf ▫$\Gamma$▫ tesen, če in samo če je lokalno povezan krepko regularen graf z netrivialnimi lastnimi vrednostmi ▫$-1-b_1(1+\theta_1)^{-1}$▫ in ▫$-1-b_1(1+\theta_d)^{-1}$▫. Za konec opišemo še tri neskončne družine in devet sporadičnih primerov tesnih razdaljno regularnih grafov.

We consider a distance-regular graph ▫$\Gamma$▫ with diameter ▫$d \ge 3$▫ and eigenvalues ▫$k = \theta_0 > \theta_1 >...> \theta_d$▫. We show the intersection numbers ▫$a_1,b_1$▫ satisfy ▫$$(\theta_1 + \frac{k}{a_1+1}) (\theta_d +\frac{k}{a_1+1} \ge -\frac{ka_1b_1}{(a_1+1)^2}$$▫. We say ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight whenewer ▫$\Gamma$▫ is not bipartite, and equality holds above. We characterize the tight property in a number of ways. For example, we show ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight if and only if the intersection numbers are given by certain rational expressions involving ▫$d$▫ independent parameters. We show ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight if and only if ▫$a_1 \ne 0$▫, ▫$a_d=0$▫, and ▫$\Gamma$▫ is 1-homogeneous in the sense of Namura. We show ▫$\Gamma$▫ is tight if and only if each local graph is connected strongly-regular, with nontrivial eigenvalues ▫$-1-b_1(1+\theta_1)^{-1}$▫ and ▫$-1-b_1(1+\theta_d)^{-1}$▫. Three infinite families and nine sporadic examples of tight distance-regular graphs are given.

mathematics /algebraic combinatorics /graph theory /distance-regular graphs /inequality /tight graphs /1-homogeneous /locally strongly-regular /parametrization

BiblioEntry.Title: Antipodal covers of strongly regular graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Antipodal covers of strongly regular graphs / Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo antipodne krove krepko regularnih grafov, ki niso nujno razdaljno regularni. Preučujemo strukturo kratkih ciklov v antipodnem krovu. V večini primerov nam to omogoči, da določimo, ali ima krepko regularen graf antipoden krov. V teh primerih krovi ne morejo biti razdaljno regularni, razen, ko so krovi bipartitnega grafa. Raziskujemo zvezo med antipodnimi krovi grafa in njegovega grafa povezav. Antipodni krovi polnih bipartitnih grafov in njihovih grafov povezav so karakterizirani s transverzalnimi designi, ki so v primeru maksimalnega krovnega indeksa ekvivalentni afini ravnini, ki ji odstranimo en paralelni razred. S tem posplošimo karakterizacijo Draka in Gardinerja razdaljno regularnih antipodnih krovov polnih bipartitnih grafov. Karakteriziramo bipartitno razdaljno regularne grafe z lihim diametrom.

Antipodal covers of strongly regular graphs which are not necessarily distance-regular are studied. The structure of short cycles in an antipodal cover is considered. In most cases, this provides a tool to determine if a strongly regular graph has an antipodal cover. In these cases covers can not be distance-regular except when they cover a complete bipartite graph. A relationship between antipodal covers of a graph and its line graph is investigated. Finally, antipodal covers of a complete bipartite graphs and their line graphs are characterized in terms of weak resolvable transverzal designs which are, in the case of maximal covering index, equivalent to affine planes with a parallel class deleted. This generalizes Drake's and Gardiner's characterization of distance-regular antipodal covers of a complete bipartite graphs. Bipartite antipodal distance-regular graphs with odd diameter are characterized.

mathematics /graph theory /algebraic combinatorics /finite geometries /affine plane /distance regular graphs /antipodal graphs /covers /strongly regular graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: Elliptic curves in cryptography
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Elliptic curves in cryptography / Aleksandar Jurišić, Alfred Menezes
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Eliptične krivulje, ki so jih v začetku študirali zgolj iz estetskih razlogov, so začeli nedavno uporabljati pri algoritmih za faktorizacijo števil, dokazovanju, da je neko naravno število praštevilo in v kriptografiji z javnimi ključi. V članku predstavimo kriptosistem z eliptičnimi krivuljami (Elliptic Curve Cryptosystem - EEC). Pojasnimo, zakaj EEC omogoča relativno majhne ključe, veliko hitrost softwarskih in hardwarskih implementacij in zakaj nam ponuja med shemami z javnimi ključi največjo varnost glede na dolžino ključev.

Originally pursued for purely aesthetic reasons, elliptic curves have recently been used in algorithms for factoring integers, primality proving, and in public-key cryptography. In this article, we will examine elliptic curve cryptosystems, and demonstrate why they provide relatively small block sizes, high-speed software and hardware implementations, and offer the highest strength-per-key-bit of any known public-key scheme.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: kriptografija /eliptične krivulje /varnost /algoritmi /kompleksnost
cryptography /elliptic curves /algorithmic complexity /security

BiblioEntry.Title: Distance-regular graphs with b [sub] 2 [equal] 1 and antipodal covers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Distance-regular graphs with b [sub] 2 [equal] 1 and antipodal covers / Makoto Araya, Akira Hiraki and Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da so razdaljno regularni grafi z valenco ▫$k>2$▫ antipodni, če je ▫$b_2=1$▫. To je odgovor na problem s strani 182 v knjigi: A. E. Browner, A. M. Cohen, A. Neumaier, Distance-regular graphs, Springer-Verlag, Berlin, 1989.

We show that a distance-regular graph of valency ▫$k>2$▫ is antipodal if ▫$b_2=1$▫.This answers problem of Brouwer, Cohen and Neumaier on p. 182 in book: Distance-regular graphs, Springer-Verlag, Berlin, 1989.

BiblioEntry.Title: Knuth's strategy for Mastermind is optimal
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Knuth's strategy for Mastermind is optimal / Aleksandar Jurišić and Ivan Stojmenović
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da je Knuthova strategija za Mastermind optimalna.
We show that knuth srategy for Mastermind is optimal.

BiblioEntry.Title: Pametna kartica
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Pametna kartica / Aleksandar Jurišić, Alenka Trojar
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pametne kartice nudijo stopnjo varnosti, ki je potrebna, da računalniške mreže zares zaživijo, ter združijo telekomunikacije in računalnike. Po kratkem pregledu zgodovinskega razvoja sledijo opisi treh spominskih kartic, ki pokažejo prednosti pametnih kartic. Opisani so aspekti varnosti in zaščite pametnih kartic. Seznanimo se z osnovnimi komponentami in karakteristikami pametnih kartic. Sledi pregled številnih aplikacij pametnih kartic in številnih možnosti uporabe v prihodnosti.

Smart cards provide the degree of security necessary to make computer networking truly viable. They unify telecommunications and computing. After a brief historical overwiew of the development of cards, we survey three basic tipes of memory cards, in order to better understand the advantages of smart cards. The security aspects of smart cards are illustrated by two examples. Applications of smart cards are surveyed and a wiev for their future possibilities are given.

BiblioEntry.Title: The Mercedes knot problem
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The Mercedes knot problem / Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Problem je geometrijske narave in spada med topologijo in teorijo vozlov. Na sredi sobe si predstavljamo žogo, ki je povezana s tremi elastikami ▫$b$▫, ▫$m$▫ in ▫$w$▫ na steno. Elastike lahko poljubno premikamo, ne moremo pa jih pretrgati, konci so fiksirani. Vpašamo se, če jih lahko premaknemo tako, da se elastika ▫$m$▫ večkrat ovije okrog elastike ▫$w$▫. Problem je dobil ime Mercedes zaradi žoge in treh vpetih elastik. Najprej "prevedemo" nalogo v matematični jezik in podamo delno rešitev. Pokažemo, kako enostavno navijemo elastiko ▫$m$▫ dvakrat oziroma sodokrat okoli elastike ▫$w$▫, nato pa poskušamo razumeti bistvo problema z vidika teorije vozlov, končno pa predstavimo tudi popolno rešitev (neeksistenčni del originalnega problema smo rešili z uporabo zvojnega števila. Omenimo tudi več povezav s tem problemom in omenimo nekatere primere uporabe (spini in kvantna fizika, efekti encimov na DNA, model kvaternionske grupe, periskop za podmornice).

The problem considered here is a geometrical one, somewhere between topology and knot theory. Imagine a ball in the middle of a room, connected with three elastic bands ▫$b$▫, ▫$m$▫, ▫$w$▫ to the wall. The elastic bands can be moved in any way but cannot be torn and their ends are fixed. The question is whether it is possible to move them so that the elastic band ▫$m$▫ is wrapped several times around the alastic band ▫$w$▫ witout moving the ball. The problem is called "the Mercedes knot problem" because of the shape formed by the ball and the three bands. We first translate the problem into mathematical language and give a partial solution (a simple way to wrwp the bands twice and, therefore, any even number of times, is shown). Then we try to understand the gist of the problem by approaching it from the knot theory point of wiev. Finally, we give a complete solution (a transparent nonexistence part of solution of the initial problem is base on the notion of twisting number). Along the way some interesting connections arise and at the end we mention some applications (quantum mechanics, effect of enzymes on a circular DNA, a model of the quaternion group and submarine's periscope).
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /topologija /kombinatorika /vozli
mathematics /topology /combinatorics /knots

BiblioEntry.Title: Distance-regular graphs with b [sub] t [equal] 1 and antipodal double-covers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Distance-regular graphs with b [sub] t [equal] 1 and antipodal double-covers / Makoto Araya, Akira Hiraki, Aleksandar Jurišić

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$G$▫ povezan graf v katerem sta za poljubno število ▫$i$▫ in za vsak par vozlišč ▫$u$▫, ▫$v$▫ grafa ▫$G$▫, ki sta oddaljeni za ▫$i$▫, števili sosedov vozlišča ▫$v$▫, ki so zaporedoma na razdalji ▫$i-1$▫ in ▫$i+1$▫ od vozlišča ▫$u$▫, odvisni samo od števila ▫$i$▫ ne pa tudi od izbire vozlišč. Potem pravimo, da je ▫$G$▫ razdaljno regularen graf. Ta števila označimo s ▫$c_i$▫ in ▫$b_i$▫. Razdaljno regularen graf ▫$G$▫ z diametrom ▫$d$▫ je antipoden dvojni krov (nad prepognjenim grafom), če in samo če je ▫$b_i=c_{d-i}$▫ za ▫$i=0,...,d$▫. Naj bo ▫$G$▫ razdaljno regularen graf z diametrom ▫$d$▫ in stopnjo ▫$k>2$▫. Če je ▫$b_t=1$▫ in je ▫$2t \le d$▫, potem ▫$G$▫ ni antipoden dvojni krov, kadar je ▫$d \le 2m-3$▫.

A connected graph ▫$G$▫ is called a distance-redular graph if for any two vertices ▫$u$▫ in ▫$v$▫ of ▫$G$▫ at distance ▫$i$▫, the number ▫$c_i$▫ (resp. ▫$b_i$▫) of neighbours of ▫$v$▫ at distance ▫$i-1$▫ (resp. ▫$i+1$▫) from ▫$u$▫ depends only on ▫$i$▫ rather than on individual vertices. A distance-regular graph ▫$G$▫ of diameter ▫$d$▫ is an antipodal double-cover of its folded graph if and only if ▫$b_i=c_{d-i}$▫, for ▫$i=0,...,d$▫. Let ▫$G$▫ be a distance-regular graph of diameter ▫$d$▫ and valency ▫$k>2$▫. If ▫$b_t=1$▫ and ▫$2t \le d$▫, then ▫$G$▫ is an antipodal double-cover. Consequently, if ▫$m>2$▫ is the multiplicity of an eigenvalue of the adjacency matrix of ▫$G$▫ and if ▫$G$▫ is not an antipodal double cover then ▫$d \le 2m-3$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Merging and antipodal distance-regular graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Merging and antipodal distance-regular graphs / A. Jurišić

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Študiramo zlivanje (fuzijo) v antipodno razdaljno regularnih grafih. Določimo, kdaj nam da zlitje prvega in zadnjega razreda v antipodnem razdaljno regularnem grafu zopet razdaljno regularen graf. Obrat: če je dan razdaljno regularen graf z enakimi presečnimi števili kot jih ima zlit graf in določeno particijo na klike, potem lahko iz njega skonstruiramo antipoden razdaljno regularen graf. To nam karakterizira razred antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov z razredom skoraj poligonov, ki vsebujejo paralelni razred. Ta karakterizacija posploši Brouwerjevo karakterizacijo razreda razdaljno regularnih grafov z diametrom 3 s posplošenimi četverokotniki, ki vsebujejo paralelni razred.

Merging (also called fusion) is studied in antipodal distance-regular graphs. The conditions are determined under which merging the first and the last classes in an antipodal distance-regular graph produces a distance-regular graph. Conversely, given a distance-regular graph with the same intersection array as the merged graph and a certain clique partition, an antipodal distance-regular graph is constructed. This gives us a characterization of a class of antipodal distance-regular graphs with a class of regular near polygons containing a certain spread, which generalizes Brouwer's characterization of a class of distance-regular graphs of diameter 3 with generalized quadrangles containing a spread.

BiblioEntry.Title: Anonimizacija podatkovnih baz = Database anonymization
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Anonimizacija podatkovnih baz = Database anonymization / Maruša Stanek, Aleksandar Jurišić, Miroslav Babić

BiblioSet.Title: Bilten
BiblioSet.Subtitle: ekonomika, organizacija, informatika v zdravstvu

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Ena od značilnosti moderne družbe je hitro naraščanje obsega zbirk osebnih podatkov. Veliko teh podatkov se uporablja v raziskovalne namene, kjer so za uporabo zaželeni čim bolj natančni podatki. Hkrati pa je nujno zagotoviti zasebnost osebnih podatkov. Če so podatki preveč splošni, je oteženo delo raziskovalcev, ki iščejo v teh podatkih korelacije. V nasprotnem primeru so lahko razkriti občutljivi osebni podatki. Zato je potrebno poiskati pravo razmerje med uporabnostjo in zaupnostjo podatkov. V ta namen je bilo predlagano, da se uporabljajo anonimizirani podatki, ki zagotavljajo tako uporabnost kot tudi anonimnost. V članku so predstavljeni nekateri načini doseganja anonimnosti podatkov ter nekateri algoritmi za anonimizacijo. Predstavljeni pristopi k anonimizaciji podatkov temeljijo na zamenjavi prvotnih specifičnih vrednosti z bolj splošnimi, a semantično ustreznimi vrednostmi.

The amount of collected personal data is increasing continuously. These data are often used for research, where the most specific information is necessary.At the same time it is necessary to assure privacy of personal data.If data are too general, then researchers have more difficulties when searching for correlations. Else if data are too specific, some sensitive personal information can be revealed. That is why the balance of utility and privacy of data has to be found. For this purpose usage of the anonymized data, which ensure utility and anonymity, was suggested. This paper describes some known anonymity principles and some algorithms for data anonymization. Presented anonymity requirements are based on replacing original specific values by more general, but semantically correct values.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: podatkovne baze /anonimnost /posploševanje
databases /anonymity /generalization

BiblioEntry.Title: Hadamardove matrike in misija Mariner 9
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Hadamardove matrike in misija Mariner 9 / Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: J. Hadamard (1865-1963) je bil eden izmed pomembnejših matematikov na prehodu iz 19. v 20. stoletje. Njegova najpomembnejša dela zajemajo področja teorije analitičnih funkcij in matematične fizike. Najbolj znan pa je po dokazu izreka o gostoti praštevil (leta 1896, hkrati s C. J. De La Vallée-Poussinom). V članku predstavljamo Hadamardove matrike, njihove karakterizacije s Hadamardovimi grafi, geometrijami in Hadamardovimi kodami ter nekaj zanimivih konstrukcij in uporabo Hadamardovih matrik v praksi.

J. Hadamard (1865-1963) was one of more important mathematicians at the turn of 19th century. He is most celebrated for his contributions in analytical functions and mathematical physics. His most important result is the prime number theorem, which he proved in 1896 (at the same time as C. J. De La Vallée-Poussin). In this article we introduce Hadamard matrices, their characterizations with Hadamard graphs, geometries and Hadamard codes, some interesting constructions and applications of Hadamard matrices in practice.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /kodiranje /Hadamardove matrike /Hadamardovi grafi /Hadamardove kode
mathematics /coding /Hadamard matrices /Hadamard graphs /Hadamard codes

BiblioEntry.Title: Reed-Solomonove kode
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Reed-Solomonove kode / Aleksandar Jurišić, Arjana Žitnik
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Reed-Solomonove kode so izjemno uspešne na področju hranjenja podatkov (CD, DVD) ter prenašanja podatkov v našem osončju (sonda Cassini je po sedmih letih vstopila v Saturnovo orbito in bo naslednja štiri leta od tam pošiljala slike na Zemljo). V sestavku obravnavamo Reed-Solomonove kode. Opišemo originalen pristop Reeda in Solomona ter pristop z linearnimi cikličnimi kodami. Povezava med njima je izpeljana s končno Fourierovo transformacijo. Predstavimo tudi polinomski algoritem za njihovo odkodiranje.

Reed-Solomon codes are thriving with its applications in the fiels of data storage (CD, DVD) and data transmition in our solar system (after seven years Cassini space probe has reached Saturn's orbit and will be sending images back to Earth for the next four years). Reed-Solomon codes are described via two different approaches: the original approach of Reed and Solomon using interpolation polynomials and the classical approach with linear cyclic codes. The connection between these two approaches is established through the finite Fourier transform. We also present a polynomial decoding algorithm.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /kodiranje /linearne ciklične kode /končna Fourierova transformacija /polinomski dekodirni algoritem
mathematics /coding /linear cyclic codes /finite Fourier transform /polynomial decoding algorithm

BiblioEntry.Title: Asociativne sheme
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Asociativne sheme / Aleksandar Jurišić, Štefko Miklavič
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Asociativne sheme so ene od temeljev moderne kombinatorike. V tem sestavku z njimi obravnavamo prepletanje algebra in kombinatorike, ki je znana pod imenom algebraična kombinatorika. Gre za diskretno matematiko, kjer pa imajo objekti in strukture določeno stopnjo regularnosti. Pomembnejša področja praktičnih uporab algebraične kombinatorike so teorija kod za odpravljanje napak, teorija statističnega načrtovanja eksperimentov ter, prek končnih geometrij in končnih obsegov, tudi kriptografija.

Association schemes provide one of the fundations of modern combinatorics. Through them we study in this paper the interaction between algebra and combinatorics that is commonly known as algebraic combinatorics. This is part of discrete mathematics, in which there is certain level of regularity. Three important applications of this area are the theory of error-correcting codes, statistical designs of experiments and, through finite geometries and the theory of finite fields, also cryptography.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /algebraična kombinatorika /asociativne sheme /primitivnost /lastne vrednosti /metrika /dualnost
mathematics /algebraic combinatorics /association schemes

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pametna kartica je močno orodje. Prej ali slej bo postala pomembnejša od osebnih računalnikov. Pametna kartica z ustrezno programsko opremo lahko predstavlja osnovo za številne sisteme. Ko jo prilagodimo posamezniku, odpre nove možnosti.

BiblioEntry.Title: Pametne kartice. Del 2, Zasebno življenje javnih ključev
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Pametne kartice. Del 2, Zasebno življenje javnih ključev / Aleksandar Jurišić, Jernej Tonejc
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Odkar so ljudje pričeli komunicirati, so želeli tudi skriti vsebino sporočil. Ta nuja ali že kar obsedenost s tajnostjo je imela izjemen vpliv na vojne, monarhije in seveda tudi na individualna življenja. Vladarji in generali so odvisni od uspešne in učinkovite komunikacije že tisočletja, hkrati pa se zavedajo posledic, če bi prišla njihova sporočila v napačne roke. Danes vse to velja tudi za vodstva uspešnih podjetij in zato postaja informacijska ali računalniška varnost ena najbolj pomembnih zahtev informacijske dobe.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: S pomočjo tesnih grafov in univerzalnih krovov pokažemo, da obstaja natanko določen razdaljno-regularen graf s presečnim zaporedjem {280, 243, 144, 10; 1, 8, 90, 280}. To pomeni, da je Pattersonov graf okarakteriziran s svojimi presečnimi števili.
Using tight graphs and universal covers, we show that there is a unique distance-regular graph with intersection array {280, 243, 144, 10; 1, 8, 90, 280}, namely the Patterson graph.

BiblioEntry.Title: Antipodal covers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Antipodal covers / Aleksandar Jurišić
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Povezan graf ▫$G$▫ imenujemo razdaljno regularen graf, če je za vsak par vozlišč ▫$u$▫ in ▫$V$▫ grafa ▫$G$▫ na razdalji ▫$i$▫ število ▫$c_i$▫ (oziroma ▫$b_i$▫) sosedov vozlišča ▫$v$▫ na razdalji ▫$i-1$▫ (oziroma ▫$i+1$▫) od vozlišča ▫$u$▫ odvisno samo od števila ▫$i$▫. Razdaljno regularen graf diametra ▫$d \in \{2m,2m+1\}$▫ je antipoden (▫$r$▫-listen krov svojega zvitega grafa), če in samo če je ▫$b_i = c_{d-i}$▫ za ▫$i = 0,...,d$▫, ▫$i \ne m$▫, ▫$(r = 1+b_m/c_{d-m})$▫. Dodekaeder je na primer dvolisten krov Petersenovega grafa, kocka pa je dvolistni krov tetraedra. večina dovolj pravilmih lončnih objektov je tesno povezana z razdaljno regularnimi grafi. Tako so na primer nekateri antipodni razdaljno regularni grafi ekvivalentni projektivnim ravninam, Hadamardovim matrikam ali pa kakšnim drugim zanimivim kombinatoričnim objektom. Razdaljno regularni grafi tako omogočajo alternativen pristop k tem objektom in s tem uporabo lastnih vrednosti grafov, prezentacije grafov, shem asociativnosti in teorije ortogonalnih polinomov. Najprej s pomočjo cikličnih krovov in posplošenih četverokotnikov odkrijemo preklapljanje, s katerim konstruiramo iz nekaterih neskončnih družin antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov diametra 3 nove neskončne družine razdaljno regularnih grafov diametra 3. Nato študiramo antipodne razdaljno regularne grafe diametra 4 in 5, izračunamo vsa njihova presečna števila ter Kreinove in absolutne meje. V primeru diametra 4 uporabiva z J. Koolenom prezentacije grafov za posplošitev rezultatov P. Terwilligerja, ki je s pomočjo Kreinovih modulov dokazal, da je v ▫$Q$▫-polinomskih antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafih okolica vsakega vozlišča krepko regularen graf. Iz tega izpeljeva nove kriterije za neeksistenco krovov. V neprimitivnih shemah asociativnosti vedno obstaja fuzija (t.j. grupiranje relacij), ki nam da nove netrivialne sheme asociativnosti. Določimo, kdaj nam dajo fuzije v antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafih zopet razdaljno regularne grafe. To pripelje do našega glavnega rezultata, karakterizacije določenih antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov z regularnimi bližnjimi mnogokotniki. V primeru diametra 3 dobimo Brouwerjevo karakterizacijo določenih razdaljno regularnih grafov s posplošenimi četverokotniki. Pogledamo še antipodne krove krepko regularnih grafov, ki niso nujno razdaljno regularni. V večini primerov nam struktura kratkih ciklov omogoča, da določimo eksistenco antipodnih krovov. Raziskujemo zvezo med antipodnimi krovi grafov in krovi njihovih povezav. Od tod izpeljemo karakterizacijo antipodnih krovov polnih bipartitnih grafov in krovov njihovih grafov povezav s šibko rezolviranimi transverzalnimi designi. Ti so v primeru maksimalnega krovnega indeksa ekvivalentni afinim ravninam brez enega paralelnega razreda. Zaključimo s predstavitvijo dveh rezultatov, ki poudarita pomembnost antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov. Prvi je skupno delo z M. Arayo in A. Hirakijem. Naj bo ▫$G$▫ razdaljno regularni graf z diametrom ▫$d$▫ in valenco ▫$k>2$▫. Če je ▫$b_t=1$▫ in ▫$2t \le d$▫, potem je ▫$G$▫ antipoden dvolisten krov. Iz tega sledi, da za večkratnost lastne vrednosti ▫$m>2$▫ matrike sosednosti grafa ▫$G$▫, ki ni antipoden dvolisten krov, velja ▫$d \le 2m-3$▫. To je izboljšava Godsilove omejitve diametra in je zelo pomembna pri klasifikaciji razdaljno regularnih grafov z majhnimi večkratnostmi lastnih vrednosti (ki je dualna klasifikaciji razdaljno regularnih grafov z majhno valenco). Drugi rezultat je skupno delo s C. Godsilom. Tu pokaževa, da so razdaljno regularni grafi, v katerih so maksimalno neodvisne poti kratke, antipodni. Konstruirava novo neskončno družino možnih parametrov antipodnih razdaljno regularnih grafov z diametrom 4. Uporabiva še ekvitabilne particije pri faktorizaciji determinant Töplitzovih matrik na produkt dveh približno pol manjših determinant.

A connected graph ▫$G$▫ is called distance-regular graph if for any two vertices ▫$u$▫ and ▫$v$▫ of ▫$G$▫ at distance ▫$i$▫, the number ▫$c_i$▫ (resp. ▫$B-i$▫) of neighbours of ▫$v$▫ at distance ▫$i-1$▫ (resp. ▫$i+1$▫) from ▫$u$▫ depends only on ▫$i$▫ rather than on individual vertices. A distance regular graph ▫$G$▫ of diameter ▫$d \in \{2m,2m+1\}$▫ is antipodal (▫$r$▫-cover of its folded graph) if and only if ▫$b_i = c_{d-i}$▫, for ▫$i = 0,...,d$▫, ▫$i \ne m$▫ (and ▫$r = 1+b_m/c_{d-m}$▫). For example, the dodecahedron is a double-cover of the Petersen graph, the cube is the double-cover of the tetrahedron. Most finite objects of sufficient regularity are closed related to certain distance-regular graphs, in particular, antipodal distance-regular graphs give rise to projective planes, Hadamard matrices and other interesting combinatorial objects. Distance-regular graphs serve as an alternative approach to these objects and allow the use of graph eigenvalues, graph representations, association schemes and the theory of orthogonal polynomials. We start with cyclic covers and spreads of generalized quadrangles and find a switching which uses some known infinite families of antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter three to produce new ones. Then we examine antipodal distance-families of antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter three to produce new ones. Then we examine antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter four and five. Together with J. Koolen we use representations of graphs to extend in the case of diameter four the result P. Terwilliger who has shown, using the theory of Krein modules, that in a ▫$Q$▫-polynomial antipodal diatance-regular graph the neighbourhood of any vertex is a strongly regular graph. New nonexistence conditions for covers are derived from that. This study relates to the above switching and to extended generalized quadrangles. In an imprimitive association scheme there always exists a merging (i.e., a grouping of the relations) which gives a new nontrivial association scheme. We determine when merging in an antipodal distance-regular graph produces a distance-regular graphs with regular near polygons containing a spread. In case of diameter three we get a Brouwer's characterization of certain distance-regular graphs with generalized quadrangles containing a spread. Finally, antipodal covers of strongly regular graphs which are not necessarily distance-regular are studied. In most cases the structure of short cycles provides a tool to determine the existence of an antipodal cover. A relationship between antipodal covers of a graph and its line graph is investigated. Antipodal covers of complete bipartite graphs and their line graphs (lattice graphs) are characterized in terms of weak resolvable transversal designs which are, in the case of maximal covering index, equivalent to affine planes with a parallel class deleted. We conclude by mentioning two results which indicate the importance of antipodal distance-regular graphs. The first one is a joint work with M. Araya and A. Hiraki. Let ▫$G$▫ be a distance-regular graph of diameter ▫$d$▫ and valency ▫$k>2$▫. If ▫$b_t=1$▫ and ▫$2t \le d$▫, then ▫$G$▫ is an antipodal double-cover. Consenquently, if ▫$m>2$▫ the multiplicity of an eigenvalue of the adjacency matrix of ▫$G$▫ and if ▫$G$▫ is not an antipodal double-cover then ▫$d \le 2m-3$▫. This result is an improvement of Godsil's diameter bound and it is very important for the classification of distance-regular graphs with an eigenvalue of small multiplicity (as opposed to dual classification of distance-regular graphs with small valency). The second result is joint work with C. Godsil. We show that distance-regular graphs that contain maximal independent geodesic paths of short length are antipodal. A new infinite family of feasible parameters of antipodal distance-regular graphs of diameter four is found. As an auxiliary result we use equitable partitions to show that the determinant of a Töplitz matrix can be written as a product of two determinants of approximately half size of the original one.
